user_data.target_needs: The main need I wanted to fulfill was finding a sports bra that provides excellent support, comfort, and functionality for my rigorous workout routine.
purchase_reason: I made this purchase primarily for the support and comfort it offers during my intense workouts. The breathable design and moisture-wicking fabric were crucial for my needs, as I engage in cycling and weight training six days a week. I was looking for a solution to the discomfort caused by my previous bras, which led me to prioritize features that would provide better fit and functionality.

My decision to buy this product was driven by the need for effective bounce control and bust containment during my workouts. The high-tech fabric and flattering design were appealing, and I appreciated that it was a bestselling option, which gave me confidence in its performance. I focused on the product details and how they aligned with my fitness routine.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer comfortable, well-fitting clothing and undergarments that provide good support without compromising on style. I value products that are true to size, made from soft and breathable materials, and that maintain their quality after washing. Additionally, I appreciate items that offer good value for money, especially when it comes to everyday essentials like bras and underwear. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that fade quickly, have poor durability, or fit uncomfortably. I also find stiff or scratchy materials unappealing, particularly in undergarments. Overall, I look for a balance of comfort, quality, and practicality in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want to find a sports bra that offers excellent support, comfort, and functionality for my intense workout sessions. within my expected price range: [35.25, 40.5]
What specific features or qualities are you looking for in terms of comfort and functionality in a sports bra for your intense workout sessions?

I'm looking for a sports bra that offers excellent support and comfort during my intense workouts. Breathable design and moisture-wicking fabric are crucial for me as I cycle and weight train six days a week. I need a solution to the discomfort caused by my previous bras, so I prioritize features that provide a better fit and functionality.
What specific size or fit preferences do you have for the sports bra to ensure it provides the best support and comfort during your intense workout sessions?

I generally prefer a sports bra that fits true to size, offering good support without compromising on comfort. I look for a design that ensures a snug fit to minimize bounce during my workouts while still allowing for freedom of movement. Breathable materials and moisture-wicking fabric are essential to keep me comfortable and dry during my intense cycling and weight training sessions. I value durability to maintain the bra's quality over time, even with frequent washing.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Champion Women's Sports Bra, Absolute, Maximum Support, High-Impact Sports Bra for Women> / Item ID: B0BJ7MTPBP / Price: $19.86 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['ABSOLUTE COMFORT. This racerback style offers all the support you need with snug compression fabric and features a SmoothTec® band that reduces chafing to promote all-day comfort. Double Dry™ technology wicks away moisture from the skin to keep you cool and dry, while the T-shaped back lets your skin breathe and allows for a greater range of motion. This sleek performance sports bra comes in tons of colors to match your everyday style. Pair it with your best Champion leggings for a workout fit all your own.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <SYROKAN Women's Sports Bra Wireless Comfort High Impact Support Bounce Control Plus Size Workout Bra> / Item ID: B08L84PDW1 / Price: $20.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Get maximum support for the highest-impact activities in a highly  structured sports bra built from advanced moisture-wicking fabric  that keeps you cool, dry and comfortable.  The two-part cups and side support work to ensure minimal movement and bounce. The firm fabric and carefully seamed cups provide the bust with strong  support and the back panels allow moisture to evaporate away from the skin. This bra is for activities including running, cross training, or other high impact activities.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Champion Women's Warrior Sports Bra> / Item ID: B01HS3JTOY / Price: $14.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women'] / Description: ['The Champion warrior sports bra takes working out to a whole new level. Available is great colors, this bra has molded cups and perforated band for ventilation. Gel straps and hook and eye make this bra your most comfortable sports bra yet']
